briefTitle: Heliox-Driven Racemic Epinephrine in Treatment of Bronchiolitis in Pediatric ED Patients
officialTitle: The Use of Heliox Driven Racemic Epinephrine Nebulization in the Treatment of Moderate to Severe Bronchiolitis in Pediatric Emergency Department Patients
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess whether children with moderate to severe bronchiolitis treated with standard racemic epinephrine therapy via 70:30 helium-oxygen (heliox) driven nebulization will have improvements in measurements of airway more rapidly than those treated with conventional air-oxygen driven nebulization.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Modified Wood's Clinical Asthma Score (M-WCAS) From Baseline to 240 Minutes
